name: Net.exe User Account Creation - Never Expire
description: Detects creation of local users via the net.exe command with the option "never expire"
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:(*\\net.exe OR *\\net1.exe) AND process.command_line:*user* AND process.command_line:*add* AND process.command_line:*expires\:never*)`
